export function saveState(state){try{var serializedState=JSON.stringify(state);localStorage.setItem('tabsoluteState',serializedState);}catch(e){// Ignore write errors;
}};export function loadState(){try{var serializedState=localStorage.getItem('tabsoluteState');if(serializedState===null){return undefined;}return JSON.parse(serializedState);}catch(e){return undefined;}};
